title: Fix Admin Panel Black Screen Routing Issue in Production

requirements.summary: Fix the /admin-panel route configuration to resolve the black screen issue in production deployment
acceptanceCriteria: The /admin-panel route loads without a black screen on the live domain
The admin login form is visible and functional at https://mhs-online-earn-platform.caffeine.xyz/admin-panel
Users can successfully navigate to /admin-panel from the browser address bar
No console errors related to routing appear when accessing /admin-panel

file_operations.description: Review and fix the route configuration for /admin-panel to ensure it properly renders the AdminLogin page component. Verify that the route is registered correctly in the TanStack Router configuration and that there are no path conflicts or missing route definitions causing the black screen. Ensure the route is accessible directly via URL navigation in production.

Review the AdminLogin component to ensure it renders correctly and doesn't have any runtime errors that could cause a black screen. Verify that the component exports are correct and that there are no missing dependencies or imports that would prevent rendering in production.

requirements.summary: Verify admin login functionality at /admin-panel works with credentials 'admin' and 'habibur123' and redirects to dashboard after authentication
acceptanceCriteria: The admin login form accepts username 'admin' and password 'habibur123'
Successful authentication redirects to the admin panel dashboard displaying the UserManagementTable and TaskManagementPanel components
Invalid credentials display an appropriate error message

file_operations.description: Verify and test the local authentication logic using hardcoded credentials (admin/habibur123). Ensure the login form properly validates credentials, stores authentication state in localStorage with the correct key, and redirects to /admin-panel route after successful authentication. Add proper error handling and user feedback for invalid credentials.

Verify that the AdminPanel dashboard properly checks for authentication state from localStorage before rendering. Ensure the component displays UserManagementTable and TaskManagementPanel after successful login. Add authentication guard logic to redirect unauthenticated users back to /admin-login if needed.

requirements.summary: Ensure /admin-panel route is accessible on production without requiring Internet Identity authentication
acceptanceCriteria: The /admin-panel route loads using local authentication only (no Internet Identity required)
The route works correctly in both development and production environments
The AdminLogin page renders properly at /admin-panel before authentication
After successful login, the AdminPanel page displays with user and task management interfaces

file_operations.description: Verify that the /admin-panel route configuration does not have any Internet Identity authentication requirements or guards that would prevent access. Ensure the route is publicly accessible for the AdminLogin page, and only the AdminPanel dashboard itself should check for local authentication state. Confirm the routing works in production by testing path resolution and component mounting.

Ensure the AdminLogin page does not trigger any Internet Identity flows or require II authentication. The page should be accessible without any authentication checks and should only use the local credential-based authentication system with hardcoded admin/habibur123 credentials.

Verify that the AdminPanel page only checks for local authentication state stored in localStorage and does not require or check for Internet Identity authentication. The component should use the local auth token to determine access, not the Internet Identity principal.
